CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
Choose between `single` for standard 1 bit bus SPI (the default), `quad` and `octal`.

*See also: [SPI Bus](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#configuration-variables)*

clk_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for the clock line of the SPI bus.

*See also: [SPI Bus](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pins.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Must be a list of exactly 4 pins to be used for the quad SPI output data lines, or exactly 8 pins for octal mode. Not used for single mode.

*See also: [SPI Bus](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this SPI hub if you need multiple SPI hubs.

*See also: [SPI Bus](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#configuration-variables)*

interface.docs:
Controls which hardware or software SPI implementation should be used. Value may be one of `any` (default), `software`, `hardware`, `spi`, `spi2` or `spi3`, depending on the type and the particular chip used. See discussion below.

*See also: [SPI Bus](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#configuration-variables)*
